body: The tcipost is calling on "every Turks and Caicos Islander with access to the Internet [to] please use all the social networks at our disposal to demand our right to self determination and bring awareness to our plight."
original_body: The tcipost is calling on "every Turks and Caicos Islander with access to the Internet [to] please use all the social networks at our disposal to demand our right to self determination and bring awareness to our plight."
title: Turks & Caicos: Now Is The Time
